import{ADD_TODO,DELETE_TODO,EDIT_TODO}from"./actions";const initialState={todos:[]// Initialize the todos array
};const reducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ADD_TODO:return{...state,todos:[...state.todos,{todo:action.payload.todo}]};case DELETE_TODO:return{...state,todos:state.todos.filter((_,index)=>index!==action.payload.index)};case EDIT_TODO:return{...state,todos:state.todos.map((item,index)=>index===action.payload.index?{...item,todo:action.payload.text}:item)};default:return state;}};export default reducer;
